root.name: Patrician II: Quest for Power
root.description: OverviewPatrician II: Quest for Power is a trading simulation and sequel to The Patrician. Set in the 13th century you are a trader that is part of the Hanseatic League, a trading organization that protects trade interests all over Lubeck and London, between Cologne and Bergen, Riga and Novgorod. Starting with a single ship and a small fortune you must travel the seas transporting needed goods, that way your fortunes will rise along with your rank eventually reaching the rank of Patrician.
